data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Nii é loozu é zoloo guye wooi ma, nii daa ga: «Sobuzobu lopai». Davide ná-guyei.
Nà-GALAGI, nà-GALAGI, lee vaa zu è ɠɛlɛa bà?
Nà-GALAGI, nà kpeei loozu foloi, è la gòoɠaaʋotesu,
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, ɗa ga GALAGI, Ɲadegai,
Ɗa ɠa gi-mɛmɛwolani ti ɠɛni ɠalivaazu è ma,
Ti ɠɛni wooɠulazu è ma, ti ɗa vie,
Kɛlɛ nɔ̀un nà, gè ɠɛa ga kpeinɲaɠagi, gè la mɔ ga nu,
Nii kpein é pɛ̀tɛsu, naati ta ɲɛɛɠulazu sù,
«É ɠitoni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋa,
Ungo, ɗa ɠa è kùlaa dèe ɠoozu,
Gè zɔlɔɔni nɔ feya, ti kàliva è ma,
Mina maaɠooza bà, mazɔlɔɔ kidaaʋiligi maaɓuɠa bà,
Sìli nuiti tatigɛ mà, eɠɛ nikɛ zinɛ ɓulugi,
Ta laalaosu dàalɔɠɔma eɠɛ zalai,
Gè ɠɛa eɠɛ ziɛi é yeizu,
Sùvikɛi vɔa, é ʋaliʋali eɠɛ penɛi,
Mazɔlɔɔ gilɛiti ti màaɠooliʋɛ,
Nà mà ɠaeiti kpein gaalusu.
Ta nà-seɠeiti gaaɠwɛɛzu ɓɔɠɔ ʋa,
Kɛlɛ ɗɔun, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, mina maaɠooza bà!
Zìi ɠula boɠa zɔkpɔi ɠa,
Kìzo zalai laaʋɛ ma,
Nà zeze ga è-laaseigi kɛ̀ɛleaiti saama.
Wɔiti wo luazu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋa, à maamusɛ!
É la bala nui ʋɛlɛʋilini, naa ná-maanɔɠɔ ziɛgi zu,
È-zaalai zu, nà è maamusɛ maaɓɔ golai zu.
Maawɔin nuiti ti daami wo, ti yiɠo.
Zou ɓela ga ɲɛgɛlɛin, ta ɠizɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zu, ti lati tɔun ma.
Mazɔlɔɔ masadai ɠa ɠɛ ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI nɔnɔ,
Etea zu zobobɛ nuiti kpein, ta daami wo, ti nɔkɔ bu,
Ti-mavofodai ɠa Maliɠii lɛbi,
Mavofodai naa ɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-telebodai lɛ adaʋɛ pɛ,
